long_description: The Thule Frame Adapter XT allows you to carry non-standard frames such as women's frame bikes or BMX bikes on a Thule hanging-style, hitch mount bike rack. Telescopic adjustment design fits all size bike frames. Molded rubber pads protect bike finish; durable rubber mounting collars secure easily and safely to bike stem and seat post. Thule Frame Adapter XT attachment and removal is simple, thanks to the easy push-button release mechanism.
short_description: The Thule Frame Adapter XT allows you to carry non-standard frames such as women's frame bikes or BMX bikes on a Thule hanging-style, hitch mount bike rack.
